metadata.author: James Tyler Kent
metadata.title: Repertory of the Homoeopathic Materia Medica
metadata.description: Kent's Repertory is a cornerstone of classical homeopathy, organizing symptoms for remedy selection.

Anxiety.description: A state of uneasiness and apprehension.

Pain, throbbing.description: Pulsating or beating pain in the head.

Aconitum Napellus.mentalGenerals: Dominating fear and anxiety in all complaints.
Aconitum Napellus.physicalGenerals: Complaints from dry, cold wind; high fever; burning pains.
